nl.tudelft.ti1100a.audio
Class ClickTrack

java.lang.Object
  nl.tudelft.ti1100a.audio.ClickTrack
All Implemented Interfaces:
Rhythm
public class ClickTrack
extends java.lang.Object
implements Rhythm

A ClickTrack is a simple implementation of Rhythm to be used with Minim.

Author:
Mara Bos (m-ou.se@m-ou.se)

          The Minim interface used by this ClickTrack.

Field Detail

minim

public final Minim minim
The Minim interface used by this ClickTrack.

Constructor Detail

ClickTrack

public ClickTrack(Minim minim,
                  float bpm,
                  int beatsPerMeasure)
Creates a new ClickTrack. The sample rate will be set to the default value of 44100.

Parameters:
minim - The Minim interface to use.
bpm - The (initial) tempo, in beats per minute.
beatsPerMeasure - The number of beats per measure.

ClickTrack

public ClickTrack(Minim minim,
                  int sampleRate,
                  int measureDuration,
                  int beatsPerMeasure)
Creates a new ClickTrack.

Parameters:
minim - The Minim interface to use.
sampleRate - The sample rate.
measureDuration - The duration, in samples, of one measure.
beatsPerMeasure - The number of beats per measure.

Specified by:

l - The RhythmListener that will be listening.

changeTempo

public void changeTempo(float factor)
Changes the tempo.

Parameters:
factor - The factor by which the tempo will be changed.

close

public void close()
Closes all used resources of the ClickTrack. Do not use the ClickTrack after it's closed.

setBpm

public void setBpm(float bpm)
Changes the tempo.

Parameters:
bpm - The new tempo, in beats per minute.

setExactMeasureDuration

public void setExactMeasureDuration(int duration)
Changes the tempo.

Parameters:
duration - The new duration, in samples, of one measure.

setMeasureDuration

public void setMeasureDuration(float duration)
Changes the tempo.

Parameters:
duration - The new duration, in seconds, of one measure.

start

public void start()
Starts the ClickTrack. When paused, start() will continue where the ClickTrack was left.

stop

public void stop()
Stops the ClickTrack.

unmute

public void unmute()
Allows the ClickTrack to make hearable clicks.
